content: Welcome aboard, First off this bat, this ISN'T an offical DOD or military site, it's a civilain operation. It's but dedicated to connecting the military types. Having said that, we do have real live recruiters that post here : Joining the Military ... . They will give you honest answers to your questions. IN general for most minor infraction you have to at least have any pending court action or penalties cleared up. Also I believe you need permission from a judge if your on any type of a probation. (DON'T QUOTE ME FOR SURE) Good Luck.
